forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 20 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 16 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends on Downtown San Francisco, the city basks in a gentle embrace of clarity, marked by a hint of the earlier fog that often drapes the bay. The evening sky stretches into a canvas of muted blues and soft grays, reflecting the residual warmth of the day while the brisk west wind stirs, whispering promises of a cool night ahead. With temperatures settling around a comfortable fifty-two degrees, the atmosphere feels invigorating, urging you to take a deep breath and relish the crispness.

Tomorrow promises a sun-drenched day. A high near sixty-two will warm the streets, though one might find the afternoon chill creeping in as temperatures fall gently. The west wind will accompany you—opinionated but refreshing, blowing at a lively pace. As the marine layer dances off in the distance, there is a sense of adventure in the air, perfect for a wander through the city's eclectic neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or grabbing a cozy coffee at a favorite café. Layering up with a light jacket or sweater would be wise, allowing for a comfortable transition from the cool evening into the warmth of the day. Embrace the atmosphere and let the elements guide your leisurely pursuits in this mesmerizing city.
